metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000022 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2016-10539. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2016-10539. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2016-10539 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: node-negotiator: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'REJECTED').
